meanings.definition: An act of dismissing or ignoring someone or something.
meanings.sent1: After receiving a brushoff from the teacher, he felt sad.
meanings.sent2: She gave him a brushoff when he asked her out on a date.
meanings.sent3: The cat's brushoff of the new toy was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her brushoff of his apology was like a cold wind on a winter day.
meanings.sent5: The boss's brushoff of the idea left everyone feeling discouraged.
meanings.sent6: Despite the brushoff, he continued to pursue his goal.
meanings.sent7: The brushoff from the customer made the salesperson rethink their approach.
